title: Announcement: CITR LIVE #03 – Cholombian, Benin City, Morgan Hislop, Library UK +Visual Artists
body:
HEY, so it’s been a little while since the last **CITR LIVE** event.

We’ve got some exciting plans coming up this summer, however, to get the ball rolling towards the warmer months we’re putting on a residents/friends of the site party on Thursday the 13TH OF MARCH – at Peckham’s THE BUSSEY BUILDING.

The event is a collaboration with **Wimbledon College of Art**, so expect the best and the brightest upcoming artists to be showing work along side each set.

[RSVP TO THE EVENT HERE. ](https://www.facebook.com/events/655319457843873/)

The music line-up is as follow:

**CHOLOMBIAN (Crackling Claps)**

**MORGAN HISLOP (Astro Nautico)**

**BENIN CITY (AUDIO DOUGHNUTS)**

**LIBRARY UK**

**DJ MOMENTS (LIBRARY UK/FEATHER)**

**SOL (CITR)**

**KIT (CITR)**

**JORDAN MCKINLAY (CRUL NET)**

Thursday 13th March

9-3am

£5 All Nightt
